variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Prince Edward Island 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 9.5% on the portion of income up to $33,328. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 13.47% on the portion of income over $33,328 up to $64,656. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 16.6% on the portion of income over $64,656 up to $105,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 17.62% on the portion of income over $105,000 up to $140,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 19% on the portion of income over $140,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_5 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all five brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
